name: Night Watch (itch)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 39 in 48 hours for the Jam

Instructions:

Use arrow keys or A&D to run

Use I to interact and O to repair

Story:

You are a night watcher who has to guard his town from ghosts. Only the light of the lanterns can scare them, but the truth is the lanterns run out of power easiiy so you must repair them. Oh you can upgrade them!

Hope you like it!
